rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Capital Skyraiders deals combat damage to a player, integrate the top card of that player’s library. [i](Exile it, then you may choose a nonland permanent it’s integrated onto.)[/i]
Capital Skyraiders gets +3/+3 as long as four or more cards are integrated onto it.
notes:
!canoncard Jace’s Phantasm
 101: Integrating is now optional.
